name: Dual Cube
description:
This game is inspired by 2cars game. I like 2cars, so I decide to make a one like this ,so I tried and here the result. This game have high score save feature, your score save automatic. In this game you can mute sound or unmute any time. Animated UI and Toggle Button. 

If you have any suggestion so comment below let me know ,so I improve next time.

Control

Tap on Screen to control cube. Tap left side to control Red cube, Right side to control Blue Cube.

Thanks for playing my game!!!
